name: Amazeverse
description:
A hypercasual puzzle game about labyrinths on planets. Each planet is a unique challenge. Its a tribute and homage to DnB nation/fans. Made on the My.Games game jam.

Gameplay: Touch on planet and drag to rotate and move the ball by physics. The objective is to reach the teleport cube inside the labyrinth.

Game Developer, Game Designer, Level Designer, UI/UX Designer: Bruno F. Medeiros

Music Composer and SFX Designer: Lanhellas Gabe
